name: Electation
description:
In the game you need to pass the levels killing various creatures, some will run away from you, others on the contrary, will chase and attack you. Score points, open new planets, collect coins for the passage of the planets and open new skins, get achievements. A 2D platformer in which you will move around on small planets.

Features:

- pleasant and simple graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
